subject: Re: Order #SSN2533 confirmed

conversations.body_text: Hi Erik Korst,    Please provide us with a video demonstrating the issue you're experiencing, and we'll resolve it for you. Don't worry.
这个应该怎么处理，能修好吗
I've provided the video? Next step please. Wish I could race Sent from my iPhone
Hi Erik Korst,     You can slightly loosen the screws on both sides of the red isolation post, and this should resolve the issue.
I sent a video!? Please replace I'll ship it back Sent from my iPhone
Hi Erik Korst,    This is just a screw adjustment issue. After loosening the screw a bit, shouldn’t it be able to resolve the auto-return problem?
